regras.texto: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

2.descricao: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate this ability only during combat.

3.descricao: At end of combat, if Kjeldoran Home Guard attacked or blocked this combat, put a -0/-1 counter on Kjeldoran Home Guard and put a 0/1 white Deserter creature token onto the battlefield.

regras.texto: The ability will trigger only if Kjeldoran Home Guard is still on the battlefield at end of combat. If it's been dealt lethal combat damage and destroyed during that combat (or has left the battlefield during that combat by any other means), its ability won't trigger and you won't get a token.

You put the Deserter token onto the battlefield even if you can't put a -0/-1 counter on Kjeldoran Home Guard (because it left the battlefield after its ability triggered but before it resolved, for example).

4.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

{2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

regras.texto: The activated ability moves this card to a new permanent.

5.descricao: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

regras.texto: You have to show which creature cards you put on top of your library, but not the order you put them there.

6.descricao:
You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay Scars of the Veteran's mana cost.

Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

7.descricao: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

regras.texto: If the creature has a negative power, the player does not lose life. It acts the same as if it had a power of zero.
The amount of life that's gained is equal to the power of the targeted creature as it last existed on the battlefield.

8.descricao:
Enchant creature

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Binding Grasp unless you pay {1}{U}.

You control enchanted creature.

Enchanted creature gets +0/+1.

9.descricao: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

regras.texto: This is all one effect. You draw 3 and return 2 cards all in one resolution. Nothing may happen between the two. If something triggers on drawing cards, it will go on the stack after Brainstorm finishes resolving.

10.descricao: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.

11.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.

At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.

regras.texto: The -0/-1 counters stay on the creature even if Essence Flare is removed.

12.descricao:
Iceberg enters the battlefield with X ice counters on it.

{3}: Put an ice counter on Iceberg.

Remove an ice counter from Iceberg: Add {1} to your mana pool.

13.descricao: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

regras.texto: Shuffling a card from your hand into your library is mandatory. The effect says "if you do" because performing that action might have been impossible. If you fail to shuffle a card into your library because your hand was empty, you won't draw any cards.

14.descricao: {U}: Counter target spell that targets Mistfolk.

15.descricao:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle his or her library.

Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

regras.texto: This does not cause a player to lose if they have less than 3 cards in their library. It allows you to look at and reorder or shuffle whatever remaining cards there might be.

16.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has flying.

Enchanted creature has first strike as long as it's blocking and you control a snow land.

17.descricao:
Flying

{U}, Exile the top card of your library: Tap target creature with flying.

{U}, Exile the top card of your library: If the exiled card is a snow land, Storm Elemental gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

regras.texto: Even though the two activated abilities have the same cost, they're separate. You choose which one you're activating before you exile the top card of your library (and see what it is).
If you activate Storm Elemental's third ability and the exiled card is not a snow land, the ability has no effect.

18.descricao:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated.

{T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

19.descricao: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

20.descricao:
Haste

{B}: Return Ashen Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if three or more creature cards are above Ashen Ghoul.

regras.texto: A card is "above" another card in your graveyard if it was put into that graveyard later.
layers may not rearrange the cards in their graveyards.
If an effect or rule puts two or more cards into the same graveyard at the same time, the owner of those cards may arrange them in any order.
The last thing that happens to a resolving instant or sorcery spell is that it's put into its owner's graveyard. Example

Say you're the owner of both a permanent and an Aura that's attached to it. If both the permanent and the Aura are destroyed at the same time (by Akroma's Vengeance, for example), you decide the order they're put into your graveyard. If just the enchanted permanent is destroyed, it's put into your graveyard first. Then, after state-based actions are checked, the Aura (which is no longer attached to anything) is put into your graveyard on top of it.

21.descricao: {2}{R}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste onto the battlefield. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

regras.texto: If the ability is activated during a turn's Ending phase (after any "at the beginning of the End step" triggers would have triggered that turn), the Graveborn token will remain on the battlefield until the following turn's End step.

22.descricao:
Enchant creature

When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.

23.descricao: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

25.descricao:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.

26.descricao: {T}, Sacrifice Gangrenous Zombies: Gangrenous Zombies deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you control a snow Swamp, Gangrenous Zombies deals 2 damage to each creature and each player instead.

regras.texto: Whether it does 1 or 2 damage is checked on resolution.

27.descricao: When Insidious Bookworms dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

28.descricao:
When Kjeldoran Dead enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.

{B}: Regenerate Kjeldoran Dead.

regras.texto: The sacrifice is a triggered ability and not a cost.
When Kjeldoran Dead's enters-the-battlefield ability resolves, if you don't control any other creatures, you must sacrifice Kjeldoran Dead itself.

30.descricao:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

regras.texto: Note that the wording "Effects that alter the creature's power alter its toughness instead, and vice versa, this turn" has been removed.

Effects that switch power and toughness are always applied last when determining a creature's power and toughness, even if other power/toughness-changing effects are created later in the turn. For example, if you activate Phantasmal Fiend's first ability, it will become 2/4. Then if you activate its second ability, it will become 4/2. Then if you activate its first ability again, it will become 3/3.
Effects that switch power and toughness apply after all other effects that change power and/or toughness, regardless of which effect was created first.
Switching a creature's power and toughness twice (or any even number of times) effectively returns the creature to the power and toughness it had before any switches.

31.descricao:
Spend only black and/or red mana on X.

Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

regras.texto: Will give 1 life for each black mana used, but not more life than the amount of unprevented damage that is dealt.

32.descricao:
Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

regras.texto: A card is "directly above" another card in your graveyard if it was put into that graveyard later and there are no cards in between the two.
layers may not rearrange the cards in their graveyards.
If an effect or rule puts two or more cards into the same graveyard at the same time, the owner of those cards may arrange them in any order.
The last thing that happens to a resolving instant or sorcery spell is that it's put into its owner's graveyard. Example

Say you're the owner of both a permanent and an Aura that's attached to it. If both the permanent and the Aura are destroyed at the same time (by Akroma's Vengeance, for example), you decide the order they're put into your graveyard. If just the enchanted permanent is destroyed, it's put into your graveyard first. Then, after state-based actions are checked, the Aura (which is no longer attached to anything) is put into your graveyard on top of it.

33.descricao: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target noncreature artifact with converted mana cost X.

regras.texto: A tip on how this math works

34.descricao: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

regras.texto: Regeneration abilities that would affect that creature can still be activated; they just won't do anything. The creature can't be regenerated for any reason, even if an effect other than Incinerate would deal lethal damage to it or otherwise destroy it.

35.descricao:
{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

{B}{B}{R}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.

{R}{G}{G}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.

36.descricao: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.

37.descricao:
Trample

Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

regras.texto: The bonus is not applied until after you check for attack legality, so it is a 2/3 creature when declaring attackers.
The ability counts the number of attacking creatures with the creature type Aurochs, not just those named Aurochs.

38.descricao:
You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay Bounty of the Hunt's mana cost.

Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

39.descricao: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

40.descricao:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.

{R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Tinder Wall deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

41.descricao: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.

42.descricao: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Giant Trap Door Spider and target creature without flying that's attacking you.

regras.texto: If Giant Trap Door Spider leaves the battlefield before its ability resolves, the ability will still resolve as normal. The targeted creature will be exiled.

If the targeted creature leaves the battlefield (or otherwise becomes an illegal target) before the ability resolves, the ability will be countered. Giant Trap Door Spider will remain on the battlefield.

43.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.

44.descricao:
{2}, {T}: Target snow land is no longer snow.

{2}, {T}: Target nonsnow basic land becomes snow.

regras.texto: Adds the snow or removes the snow supertype to or from a land. Adding snow doesn't overwrite other supertypes.
Can't be used on a dual land to add the Snow Supertype even though it is a basic land subtype. You can use it on any land to remove the snow supertype.

45.descricao: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

46.descricao: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

47.descricao: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 3 or less gains flying until end of turn.
